Warkworth, Ontario

The Richards family has strong roots in Warkworth, and many of our other branches also have ties there. It is a small village in Percy Township and is surrounded by seven hills. We do not have many pictures of Warkworth at the moment but do have a number of other documents you may enjoy having a look at. Please let us know if you can add any photos of Warkworth and area to our family archive. Click on the thumbnail view here to see a larger version of the picture. Then click "back" on your browser to return to this page.
